issue.title: working-permits-v2.qiwa.sa
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://working-permits-v2.qiwa.sa/issue-or-renew](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fworking-permits-v2.qiwa.sa%2Fissue-or-renew) ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/jhvw2bsizcgss084so0k4gc4kcgsg0487xi45d4o5c.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.80 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:

AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:

Annoyances:

AdGuard Popups,

AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Phishing URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

Other:

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard German,
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters,
Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List,
IndianList,
Macedonian adBlock Filters Filters last update: | September 19, 2025 at 17:02 ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.80&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=1.2.3.4.6.10.11.17.18.19.20.21.22.208.249.252.253.254.255.256.257&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.block_trackers=true&filters_last_update=2025-09-19T17%3A02%3A48)
